title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Learning Objective Design Using Cognitive Task Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three cognitive requirements of science curriculum learning objectives by applying the Knowledge Audit procedure of the ACTA technique.
Learners can structure thinking process stages into four or more levels according to elementary science education goals using a Task Diagram.
Learners can establish measurable learning objectives aligned with SMART criteria, considering the linkage between learner levels and curriculum standards.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
